Uses of Interface
com.vectorprint.report.itext.DocumentAware

  • Packages that use DocumentAware 
    Package Description
    com.vectorprint.report.itext
    primary classes for building iText reports; typically one will first study the possibilities of styling and annotating existing dataclasses, extend DataCollectorImpl and use ReportRunner to run the report.
    com.vectorprint.report.itext.debug
    classes to support debugging your reports by adding visual feedback to the report in a layer and information on the setup and the styling used
    com.vectorprint.report.itext.mappingconfig
    An interface for for processing information on how to map data to report parts.
    com.vectorprint.report.itext.style
    interfaces and classes to support configurable styling of iText reporting elements in a css like manner.
    com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.conditions
    classes to support conditional application of styling
    com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers
    Parametrizable classes responsible for styling.

    • Uses of DocumentAware in com.vectorprint.report.itext

      Classes in com.vectorprint.report.itext that implement DocumentAware 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BaseReportGenerator<RD extends ReportDataHolder>
      This implementation of ReportGenerator uses a EventHelper and a ElementProducer to build an iText report.
      class  EventHelper<RD extends ReportDataHolder>
      Responsible for printing headers, footers, debugging and failure information.

    • Uses of DocumentAware in com.vectorprint.report.itext.debug

      Classes in com.vectorprint.report.itext.debug that implement DocumentAware 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DebugStyler<DATATYPE>
      Responsible for providing visual debugging feedback for tables and cells and for collecting styling information

    • Uses of DocumentAware in com.vectorprint.report.itext.mappingconfig

      Subinterfaces of DocumentAware in com.vectorprint.report.itext.mappingconfig 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DatamappingProcessor
      suggested methods for an annotation processor, used from ReportGenerator.processData(com.vectorprint.report.data.ReportDataHolder)
      Classes in com.vectorprint.report.itext.mappingconfig that implement DocumentAware 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDatamappingProcessor 

    • Uses of DocumentAware in com.vectorprint.report.itext.style

      Subinterfaces of DocumentAware in com.vectorprint.report.itext.style 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  BaseStyler
      Stylers are responsible for styling iText building blocks (Elements, fields) for reports.
      interface  DocumentStyler<RD extends ReportDataHolder>
      Responsible for setting properties of the document such as page size, margins, encryption etc.
      interface  FormFieldStyler
      Responsible for drawing a form field based on the position of a table cell.
      interface  StylerFactory
      Responsible for providing ReportGenerators and ElementProducers with stylers.
      Classes in com.vectorprint.report.itext.style that implement DocumentAware 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultStylerFactory 

    • Uses of DocumentAware in com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.conditions

      Classes in com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.conditions that implement DocumentAware 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PageNumberCondition 

    • Uses of DocumentAware in com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers

      Subinterfaces of DocumentAware in com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Advanced<DATATYPE>
      An advanced styler is a styler that is meant to draw directly on the canvas as opposed to regular stylers that only configure elements later to be added to the document.
      Classes in com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers that implement DocumentAware 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractFieldStyler
      Base class for drawing form fields on the canvas of a cell.
      class  AbstractPositioning<DATATYPE>
      This styler is meant to draw near an Chunk using the generic tag mechanism of Chunk.
      class  AbstractStyler
      Baseclass for stylers providing support for some general functionality such as parameters, conditions, help and Element class support.
      class  AddCell
      add a cell to a table
      class  AdvancedImpl<DATATYPE>
      an advanced styler for directly drawing on a canvas, can be used from setup in two ways: draw (conditionally) on each page, draw after a certain Chunk is drawn.
      class  Alignment
      alignment for paragraphs (only horizontal) and cells
      class  Background
      background color for rectangles
      class  Barcode
      printing barcodes as images
      class  Border
      printing borders for rectangles
      class  ColRowSpan
      setting row and / or colspan on cells
      class  DocumentSettings<RD extends ReportDataHolder>
      settings for a pdf, supports page size, margins and encryption.
      class  FieldBackground 
      class  FieldBorder 
      class  FieldFont 
      class  Font
      font settings for text (chunks and phrases)
      class  Height
      height of cells or phrases
      class  Image<DATATYPE>
      Class for adding images (pdf (first page), tiff (first page) or other formats supported by the default awt toolkit) to a report.
      class  ImageAlign
      align images in a cell, needed because horizontal align does not work for images in cells.
      class  ImportPdf
      import pages from a pdf near a certain element
      class  ImportTiff
      import pages from a tiff image near a certain element
      class  Indent
      indentation for sections, paragraphs or cells
      class  KeepTogether
      keep a table or paragraph on one page
      class  Leading
      specify leading (height) for phrases
      class  Link
      Styler to configure links and targets in your pdf
      class  List
      Settings for lists, numbered, alpha, bullet,...
      class  ListItem
      Settings for listItems, numbered, alpha, bullet,...
      class  NewLine
      start a new line before or after some content
      class  NewPage
      start a new page
      class  NoWrap
      don't wrap text in a cell
      class  Padding
      padding for cells
      class  Page
      change page settings, size, margins and background.
      class  Rotation
      set rotation for cells
      class  Shadow<DATATYPE>
      draws a dropshadow for text
      class  Shape<DATATYPE>
      drawing shapes with / without border or fill, with a nice feature to surround text
      class  SimpleColumns
      Printing content (text, tables, lists and images) in rectangular columns of equal width with spacing between them.
      class  Spacing
      printing space before / after a table, paragraph or image
      class  Table
      setup a table
      class  Text
      print text near a chunk with a generic tag
      class  Underline<DATATYPE>
      draws a line under text
      class  Zebra
      zebra striping for tables
